interactiveElements.title: Door
interactiveElements.question: To open the door solve 5 puzzles to get a secret code
interactiveElements.successMessage: Your code is correct, the door is opening ...

interactiveElements.title: Statue
interactiveElements.question: You find the secret compartment behind the statue. To open, say what is the atomic number of iron
interactiveElements.successMessage:
Your answer is correct. The third number in code is 4. Your code looks like this
_ _ 4 _ _

interactiveElements.title: Drawer
interactiveElements.question: You find a locked drawer. To open, enter the result of 22 raised to the power of 22 ( 22²² )
interactiveElements.successMessage:
Your answer is correct. The second number in code is 3. Your code looks like this
_ 3 _ _ _

interactiveElements.title: Pot
interactiveElements.question: You find a pot with a locked lid. To open, enter the root for equation x²- 4x + 4
interactiveElements.successMessage:
Your answer is correct. The first number in code is 1. Your code looks like this
1 _ _ _ _

interactiveElements.title: Board
interactiveElements.question: You find a board with a hidden message. To reveal, enter the area of Nepal in square kilometers
interactiveElements.successMessage:
Your answer is correct. The fourth number in code is 5. Your code looks like this
_ _ _ 5 _

interactiveElements.title: Picture
interactiveElements.question: You find a picture with a hidden code. To reveal, enter the number of districts in Nepal
interactiveElements.successMessage:
Your answer is correct. The third number in code is 3. Your code looks like this
_ _ _ _ 2
